regen.new_specification: The system shall enable the assignment and management of passwords to each staff member as part of their security credentials.
The configuration option shall allow a password to be assigned to each defined staff member.

regen.absent_element: assignment of passwords to staff members
regen.new_specification: The configuration option shall allow the assignment of passwords to each defined staff member for secure access.

label: The configuration option shall allow a security level and password to be assigned to each defined staff member.
absence: a password to be assigned to each staff member
